DOC.brief_summary: This study intend demonstrate bioequivalence two formulation , effect food water one formulation safety tolerability two formulation lamotrigine healthy male female volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence And Effect Of Food And Water On Lamotrigine Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 19 55 year inclusive BMI within range 19 32 kg/m2 inclusive . Female subject childbearing potential eligible unwilling unable use appropriate method contraception least 30 day prior first study drug 30 day . Female subject pregnant lactating . Female subject use hormonal contraceptive precaution include progesteronecoated intrauterine device ( IUD ) . Female subject use hormonal replacement therapy . History regular alcohol consumption > 7 drink week woman 14 drink week men Current smoker 10 cigarette per day
